videoshootingtime: Based on 8GB Memory card [1920 x 1080] 30 fps/25 fps/24 fps: 32 min. with IPB compression 11 min. with All-I compression [1280 x 720] 60 fps/50 fps: 37 min. with IPB compression 12 min. with All-I compression [640 x 480] 30 fps/25 fps: 97 min. with IPB or All-I compression
meteringrange: EV 1-20 (at 73°F/23°C with EF 50mm f/1.4 USM lens, ISO 100)
interfacelanguages: 25 (English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Portuguese, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Greek, Russian, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Romanian,Ukraine, Turkish, Arabic, Thai, Simplified/Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese)
exposurecontrol: Creative Zone Program AE (Shiftable), Shutter-priority AE, Aperture-priority AE, Manual exposure, Bulb, Custom shooting mode, Basic zone Scene Intelligent Auto (Program AE / non-shiftable), Creative Auto Special Scene Portrait, Landscape, Close-up, Sports, Night Portrait, Handheld Night Scene, HDR Backlight Control mode
weight: Approx. 26.7 oz. / 755g (CIPA standard) Approx. 24.0 oz. / 680g (Body only)
autowhitebalance: Auto white balance with the image sensor
shutterspeeds: 1/4000 to 30 sec., X-sync at 1/180 sec. (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode.)
usbterminal: For personal computer communication and direct printing (USB 2.0 Hi-Speed)
imagetype: Still: JPEG, RAW (14-bit, Canon original), RAW+JPEG Video: MOV (Image data: H.264, Audio: Linear PCM)
size: Large: Approx. 20.0 megapixels (5,472 x 3,648) Medium: Approx. 8.9 megapixels (3,648 x 2,432) Small 1: Approx. 5.0 megapixels (2,736 x 1,824) Small 2: Approx. 2.5 megapixels (1920 x 1280) Small 3: Approx. 350,000 pixels (720 x 480) RAW: Approx. 20.0 megapixels (5,472 x 3,648) M RAW: Approx. 11.0 megapixels (4,104 x 2,736) S RAW: Approx. 5.0 megapixels (2,736 x 1,824)
selectedafpointdisplay: Displayed or indicated by superimposed display in the viewfinder and on the LCD monitor.
videoisorange: Auto ISO range: ISO 100-12800 Manual ISO range: ISO 100-12800 in 1/3- or whole-stop increments (expandable to H: ISO 16000/20000/25600) * If highlight tone priority is set, automatically set within ISO 200 or higher.
afassistbeam: Enable Disable IR AF-assist beam only
shutterlagtime: (1) During SW-1 ON, time lag between SW-2 ON and start of exposure: approx. 0.060 sec. (2) Time lag between simultaneous SW-1/SW-2 ON and start of exposure: Approx. 0.144 sec. * Time lag with the aperture stopped down by 3.5 stops or less (Excludes AF operation time).
viewfinderinformation: AF information:AF points and focus confirmation Exposure information: Shutter speed, aperture, ISO speed (always displayed), AE lock, exposure level, exposure warning Flash information:Flash ready, flash exposure compensation, high-speed sync, FE lock Image information:Highlight tone priority (D+), maximum burst (2-digit display), card information Battery check Composition information: Electronic level Warning Symbol
isospeedrecommendedexposureindex: Auto and Manual setting range of ISO 100-25600 (expansion possible to ISO 50, ISO 51200 and 102400) in 1/3-stop or whole-stop increments)
afworkingrange: Center AF Point: EV -3 to 18 (at 73°F/23°C, ISO 100) Other AF points: EV +0.5 to 18 (at 73°F/23°C, ISO 100)
videofileformat: MOV (Image data: MPEG-4 AVC / H.264) Audio: Linear PCM (Stereo)
drivemodes: (1) Single shooting (2) Continuous shooting (3) Silent single shooting (4) Silent continuous shooting (5) 10-sec. self-timer/Remote control (6) 2-sec. self-timer
recordingformat: Complies with Design rule for Camera File system 2.0 and EXIF 2.30
afpoints: 11 pointsall cross-type AF (f/2.8 at center: Dual Cross Sensor) Center: cross-type at f/5.6; vertical line-sensitive at f/2.8. Upper and lower AF points: vertical line-sensitive AF at f/5.6. Other AF points: Horizontal line-sensitive AF at f/5.6.
flashmetering: E-TTL II autoflash (evaluative flash metering and average flash metering)
battery: One Battery Pack LP-E6 With the AC Adapter Kit ACK-E6, AC power is possible. With Battery Grip BG-E13, two battery packs (LP-E6) can be used. Or six AA-sized/LR6 batteries can be used
meteringmodes: Real-time evaluative metering with image sensor. (1) Evaluative metering (315 zones) (2) Partial metering (approx. 11% of Live View screen) (3) Spot metering (approx. 3% of Live View screen) (4) Center-weighted average metering
monitorsize: 3.0-inches (Screen aspect ratio of 3:2) 7.7cm diagonal (6.37cm wide, 4.25cm high)
imageplaybackdisplayformat: Single image display Two types of single-image full display, two types of shooting information Index display o 4-image index and 9-image index Jump display Jump 1/10/100 images, Shooting Date, Folder, Movies, Stills, or Rating
filenumbering: Consecutive numbering, auto reset, manual reset
histogram: Brightness and RGB can be displayed.
continuousshootingspeed: Continuous shooting: Max. approx. 4.5 fps Silent continuous shooting: Max. approx. 3.0 fps
externalspeedlitecontrol: Provided * Compatible with radio wireless flash photography.
focusingscreen: Eg-A II provided. Interchangeable with Eg-D and Eg-S. Incompatible with Eg-A.
colortemperaturecompensation: Blue/amber bias: ±9 levels Magenta/green bias: ±9 levels * Correction based on the current WB mode's color temperature
highlightalert: With single-image display (Info.) and single-image display, overexposed highlight areas will blink.
whitebalancesettings: Auto, Preset (Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten Light, White Fluorescent Light, Flash), Custom (Approx. 2,000° - 10,000°K), Color Temperature (Approx. 2,500° - 10,000°K), White Balance Correction, and White Balance Bracketing
focusing: (1) Autofocus 1. FlexiZone - Single * One-point, contrast AF. Switching to another AF point is possible. 2. Face Detection Live mode * Face detection, contrast AF. Face is selectable. 2. Face Detection Live mode * Face detection, contrast AF. Face is selectable. 3. Quick Mode AF * Phase-difference AF with 11 AF points. (2) Manual Focus 1. Magnify the image by 5x or 10x and focus manually.
rawjpegsimultaneousrecording: Yes Large RAW and JPEG images are recorded simultaneously
dustdeletionfeature: Self Cleaning Sensor Unit Dust Delete Data acquisition and appending Manual cleaning
brightnessadjustment: Manually adjustable to one of 7 levels
picturestyle: Auto, Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Defined 1-3
lowpassfilter: Fixed position in front of the CMOS sensor
shuttertype: Vertical-travel, mechanical, focal-plane shutter with all speeds electronically-controlled
compatiblelenses: Canon EF lenses (except EF-S and EF-M lenses)
exposurecompensation: Manual: ±5 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments AEB : ±3 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments
audiovideooutterminal: Audio/Video (Out) Terminal (1) AV stereo OUT terminal: NTSC/PAL selectable (2) mini-HDMI OUT terminal (Type C)
recordingmedia: SD card, SDHC card, SDXC memory card * Compatible with Ultra High Speed (UHS-I) memory cards.
viewfindermirror: Quick-return half mirror (transmission: reflection ratio of 40:60)
maximumburst: Based on 8GB memory Card: JPEG Large/Fine: Approx. 73 Shots RAW: Approx. 14 Shots RAW+JPEG Large/Fine: 7 Shots Based on 8GB UHS-I memory card: JPEG Large/Fine: Approx. 1250 Shots RAW: Approx. 17 Shots RAW + JPEG Large/Fine: 8 Shots
focusingmodes: Autofocus: One-Shot AF - AI Servo AF - AI Focus AF Manual focus
